p: COVID-19 was first detected in the eastern part of France in January 2020 in travelers from China [ 1]. After an initial period where the control of local clusters was successful, increased community circulation was noted by late February, especially in the northern and eastern parts of France [ 2]. The number of cases requiring intensive care increased from early March, leading to Intensive Care Units (ICU) overcrowding and the decision of a national lockdown on March 17th to control the epidemic.
